title: How hidden lakes threaten Antarctic Ice Sheet stability
summary: For decades, satellites have played a crucial role in our understanding of the remote polar regions. The ongoing loss of Antarctic ice, owing to the climate crisis, is, sadly, no longer surprising. However, satellites do more than just track the accelerating flow of glaciers towards the ocean and measure ice thickness.

title: Portuguese Space Agency Highlights Dual-Use Space Investments
summary:
A review carried out by the Portuguese Space Agency has found that over the last six years, the agency has invested roughly €40 million into projects with “dual-use potential.” The term dual-use refers to the leveraging of technologies, infrastructure, and supply chains to serve both civilian and defense applications. This allows for greater scalability, cost […]
The post Portuguese Space Agency Highlights Dual-Use Space Investments appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: NASA Makes Progress on Advanced Drone Safety Management System
summary: From agriculture and law enforcement to entertainment and disaster response, industries are increasingly turning to drones for help, but the growing volume of these aircraft will require trusted safety management systems to maintain safe operations.
